lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Shang
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Jurrivh
[00:04.450]
[00:18.760]I'm feeling really bad right now and um
[00:21.630]I'm not sure if I'm gonna make it so
[00:24.860]I guess it's goodbye
[00:29.280]Babe I know I've done you wrong
[00:33.130]I can hear it in your songs
[00:36.790]I can see it on your face
[00:40.610]Won't be long for I'm replaced
[00:44.860]I'll miss the times we had
[00:48.100]And I'll miss the laughs we shared
[00:51.930]I'll miss staying up till midnight
[00:52.860]Hey um
[00:55.990]And the times when everything felt right
[00:59.540]
[00:59.890]我关于你的记忆
[01:01.320]消失了一件又一件
[01:03.390]午夜的未接来电
[01:04.969]我拨打了一遍又一遍
[01:07.150]我想要听我的脉搏心跳
[01:09.280]却又断了线
[01:10.909]睡梦中你的身影
[01:12.469]我复习了一面又一面
[01:14.860]漫长的夜 开始分裂 昏暗的灯火也慢慢熄灭
[01:18.970]不想了解 我的一切
[01:20.810]酒后的真心话全都不屑
[01:22.620]我不想再去怀念
[01:24.260]走心的话我都留在心里面
[01:27.060]我学着把冷漠
[01:28.530]挂在嘴边白天到黑夜
[01:30.150]Baby I don't even need you
[01:33.810]Baby I don't even miss you
[01:37.560]Baby I don't know if it is true
[01:41.360]Baby I just want to heal myself
[01:45.099]Baby take it all away
[01:51.269]
[01:52.040]I don't wanna feel this pain
[01:55.580]I don't wanna feel this way
[02:00.140]I can see the stars in your eyes
[02:06.980]I was trying to feel OK
[02:10.729]I just wanna heal my own brain
[02:14.860]
[02:15.370]Babe I know I've done you wrong
[02:18.879]I can hear it in your songs
[02:22.639]I can see it on your face
[02:26.379]Won't be long for I'm replaced
[02:30.569]I'll miss the times we had
[02:33.960]And I'll miss the laughs we shared
[02:37.669]I'll miss staying up till midnight
[02:41.639]And the times when everything felt right
[02:45.349]
[02:45.660]我要把所有关于
[02:47.069]我们的记忆删个遍
[02:49.389]像张白纸再也不会
[02:51.379]为谁触了电
[02:53.099]卑微的生活
[02:54.069]还是毁灭全都随我便
[02:56.660]我落魄的样子
[02:57.830]谁也不能忍心看的见
[03:00.669]配不配 对不对
[03:02.259]你怎么样我都无所谓
[03:04.460]睡不睡 累不累
[03:06.349]我从来都不害怕浪费
[03:08.240]你可千万不要嫌弃
[03:09.610]我身上掩盖的烟酒味
[03:12.000]难过的时候谁也不会
[03:13.889]独自孤单掉着泪 Baby I don't even need you
[03:19.389]Baby I don't even miss you
[03:23.259]Baby I don't know if it is true
[03:26.860]Baby I just want to heal myself
[03:30.550]Baby take it all away
[03:36.289]
[03:37.810]I don't wanna feel this pain
[03:41.569]I don't wanna feel this way
[03:46.069]I can see the stars in your eyes
[03:52.770]I was trying to feel OK
[03:56.449]I just wanna heal my own brain
[04:00.599]I just wanna heal my own brain
[04:04.129]I just wanna heal my own brain
[04:07.939]I just wanna heal my own brain
[04:11.629]I just wanna heal my own brain
[04:15.500]Prod. happy  sad/Jurrivh
[04:16.500]发行：北京太声文化传播有限公司
